books.title: Git Pocket Guide
books.subTitle: A Working Introduction
books.author: Richard E. Silverman
books.description: This pocket guide is the perfect on-the-job companion to Git, the distributed version control system. It provides a compact, readable introduction to Git for new users, as well as a reference to common commands and procedures for those of you with Git exp
